<style>
@font-face {
    font-family: 'bebas_neue_proSexpandedBdIt';
    src: url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0598/4223/2473/files/bebasneuepro-semiexpbolditalic-webfont.woff2?v=1632822359') format('woff2'),
         url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0598/4223/2473/files/bebasneuepro-semiexpbolditalic-webfont.woff?v=1632822359') format('woff');
    font-weight: normal;
    font-style: normal;

}
@font-face {
    font-family: 'metropolisbold';
    src: url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0598/4223/2473/files/metropolis-bold-webfont.woff2?v=1632833618') format('woff2'),
         url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0598/4223/2473/files/metropolis-bold-webfont.woff?v=1632833618') format('woff');
    font-weight: normal;
    font-style: normal;

}
@font-face {
    font-family: 'TeXGyreAdventor';
    src: url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0598/4223/2473/files/TeXGyreAdventor-Regular.woff2?v=1632851105') format('woff2'),
        url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0598/4223/2473/files/TeXGyreAdventor-Regular.woff?v=1632851104') format('woff');
    font-weight: normal;
    font-style: normal;
    font-display: swap;
}
@font-face {
    font-family: 'Metropolis Extra';
    src: url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0598/4223/2473/files/Metropolis-ExtraBold.woff2?v=1632851288') format('woff2'),
        url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0598/4223/2473/files/Metropolis-ExtraBold.woff?v=1632851288') format('woff');
    font-weight: 800;
    font-style: normal;
    font-display: swap;
}
@font-face {
    font-family: 'bebas_neue_proSexpandedXBd';
    src: url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0598/4223/2473/files/bebasneuepro-semiexpxbold-webfont.woff2?v=1632889509') format('woff2'),
         url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0598/4223/2473/files/bebasneuepro-semiexpxbold-webfont.woff?v=1632889509') format('woff');
    font-weight: normal;
    font-style: normal;

}

</style>
